argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | ldualsadd.f | |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) |
| 2 |  | ldualsadd.q | |- .+ = ( +g ` F ) |
| 3 |  | ldualsadd.d | |- D = ( LDual ` W ) |
| 4 |  | ldualsadd.r | |- R = ( Scalar ` D ) |
| 5 |  | ldualsadd.p | |- .+b = ( +g ` R ) |
| 6 |  | ldualsadd.w | |- ( ph -> W e. V ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( oppR ` F ) = ( oppR ` F ) |
| 8 | 1, 7, 3, 4, 6 | #P_ldualsca | |- ( ph -> R = ( oppR ` F ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ph -> ( +g ` R ) = ( +g ` ( oppR ` F ) ) ) |
| 10 | 7, 2 | #P_oppradd | |- .+ = ( +g ` ( oppR ` F ) ) |
| 11 | 9, 5, 10 | #P_3eqtr4g | |- ( ph -> .+b = .+ ) |
